Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Whistler Village Inn And Suites in Whistler (Whistler Village), you'll be minutes from Whistler Visitor Centre and Whistler Blackcomb Ski Resort. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Blackcomb Excalibur Gondola and Whistler Village Gondola.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 86 air-conditioned rooms featuring DVD players and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
After a day on the slopes, enjoy recreational amenities including a health club and an outdoor pool. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and ski storage.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Whistler Village Inn And Suites. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Whistler Village Inn And Suites. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Whistler Visitor Centre - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Blackcomb Excalibur Gondola - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Whistler Blackcomb Ski Resort - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Whistler Village Gondola - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi

Family Adventure Zone - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Whistler Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Whistler Golf Club - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Whistler Medals Plaza - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Whistler Marketplace - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Squamish Lil'wat Cultural Centre - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Coca-Cola Tube Park - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Whistler Sliding Centre - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Rainbow Trail - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi

The preferred airport for Whistler Village Inn And Suites is Vancouver, BC (YVR-Vancouver Intl.) - 103.6 km / 64.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
